--------------------------------------------
Take your (Storm) Water Modeling to the next level with PySWMM and the OpenWaterAnalytics Initiative
--------------------------------------------
PySWMM is a Python wrapper for the SWMM software (created by the US Environmental Protection Agency - EPA) for the creation, manipulation, and study of the structure, dynamics, and function of complex sewer networks including hydrodynamic modeling, water quality and optimization!

About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018  - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.


- The Python Software Foundation -
- EAFIT University -  http://www.eafit.edu.co/
